short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to customize the chrome new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension that allows the you to heavily customize the default new tab. It comes with several background modes, and even lets you upload your own custom images. In addition you are able to change the tab icon, and tab name.
